questions.question: In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates explore an island shaped like a drum and encounter a reindeer doctor. What is...?
This arc involves the Straw Hat Pirates exploring a dangerous, beast-filled island and confronting a mad scientist. What is...?
Set on a cloud island, this arc features a battle against a powerful Warlord of the Sea known for his fiery fists. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to turn their body parts into weapons. What is...?
This technique, used by Brook, involves using the cold of the underworld to freeze opponents. What is...?
This devil fruit allows its user to create tremors capable of causing massive destruction, and was notably used by one of the Yonko. What is...?
This character, known for their nickname 'Dead Bones', is a former Warlord of the Sea and master of swordsmanship. Who is...?
This character, originally from Drum Island, is noted for his blue-nose and ability to shapeshift. Who is...?
This character, known for their control over ice and introduction in the Whole Cake Island arc, is one of the three Sweet Commanders of the Big Mom Pirates. Who is...?
